thread.title: S.F’s Prop. E splits allies over open government
thread.title_full: S.F’s Prop. E splits allies over open government - San Francisco Chronicle

author: John Wildermuth
title: S.F’s Prop. E splits allies over open government
text:
Photo: Michael Macor, The Chronicle Besides expanding live coverage far beyond the 30 or so city meetings now televised or taped, Prop. E also requires the city to allow at least 30 minutes of taped or live video testimony on any meeting item open to public discussion. Besides expanding live coverage far beyond the 30 or so city...
It’s typically impossible to find any San Francisco politician or community group opposed to more openness in government, but Proposition E has managed to do just that. Besides expanding live coverage far beyond the 30 or so city meetings now televised or taped, Prop.
